Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller

Class CustomersViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller.CustomersViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomersViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Handles the logic associated with display a table of all Customers and provides options to search for, create, update or delete Customers.

      • loadCustomerView

        private void loadCustomerView​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              int selectCustomerId)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Load the Customer modal and set it up for either creating or updating a Customer.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event triggered by Create or Update buttons
        title - Title of the modal
        selectCustomerId - Valid identifier for the Customer to be updated; If not valid modal will be for creation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader cannot load CustomerView.fxml.
